HASTE.NAME: Haste
HASTE.DESC: On round start, increase the Speed of {owner}'s actions by {stacks}, then remove all Haste.

SLOW.NAME: Slow
SLOW.DESC: On round start, reduce the Speed of {owner}'s actions by {stacks}, then remove all Slow.

STAGGERED.NAME: Staggered
STAGGERED.DESC:
Cannot take actions. All incoming damage is doubled.
This effect wears off at the start of round {UNSTAGGER_ROUND}.
